entry.title: What are Blue Chip NFTs
entry.summary: Blue Chip is an investment term that first surfaced in the 1920s when Oliver Gingold, a stock quote clerk at Dow Jones & Company, noticed that certain high-priced stocks were trading at $200 or more per share. Poker players bet in blue, white, and red chips with the blue chips having a higher value. Blue-chip [...]
